entry.title: Derby Originals 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Blankets
Price: 34.95

Our 600D Shimmering Star Ripstop Waterproof Nylon Medium Weight Mini Horse and Pony Turnout Blankets were designed to offer an adorable, colorful, yet still hardy blanket option for the little equine in your life! These blankets are a mix of fun pink and purple stars on a pink background with purple accenting and a pink and purple striped trim. This blanket has all your favorite turnout blanket features: front chest buckles, a shoulder gusset, a fleece wither protector, crossed belly straps, removable elastic leg straps, and a tail cover.


Waterproof Construction: this blanket is made from a waterproof nylon material covered in a  Teflon coating. These blankets are guaranteed to be fully waterproof unless the blanket is ripped/torn, or the Teflon coating is damaged through improper washing or cleaning, or abuse of the blanket.

  • THE PERFECT WINTER BLANKET - this blanket is the perfect winter blanket for almost any horse and climate, due to it’s highly adjustable and classic features, hefty 250g of Polyfil, and sturdy ripstop nylon shell.
  • COMFORTABLE, ADJUSTABLE FIT - this blanket features a shoulder gusset for an advanced freedom of movement, a soft fleece wither protector, and a soft 210T nylon inner lining to prevent irritation on the hair coat.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MINIS AND PONIES - this blanket was designed to best fit the bodies of miniature horses and pony breeds, who often differ in conformation when compared to horses.
  • RIPSTOP NYLON OUTER SHELL - this blanket features a 600D ripstop nylon construction that is extremely tear and cut resistant, meaning that you can leave your horse in the barn or at pasture without worry of a blanket tear.
  • ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER’S WARRANTY - this blanket comes with a one year manufacturer’s warranty through Derby Originals, which protects against manufacturing and quality defects.

Sizing Information

This turnout blanket is sized in the same manner that you will size any other horse blanket: by measuring, in inches, from the center of your horse’s chest to the end of your horse’s rump. If your horse is in-between sizes, we recommend sizing up to the closest available size.

 

Product Information

Blanket Style: Turnout Blanket

Waterproof: Yes

Breathable: Yes

Weight: Medium Weight

Material: Nylon

Denier: 600

Ripstop: Yes

Tail Cover: Yes

Wither Protector: Yes

Shoulder Gussets: Yes

Polyfill: 250g

Inner Lining: 210T Nylon

Belly Closure: Crossed Surcingles

Leg Straps: Crossed Elastic

Colors Available: Shimmering Star

Sizes Available: 36”, 40”, 44”, 48”, 54”, 58”, 60”, 62”, 64”, and 66”

entry.title: Waterproof 420D Draft Sheets with 210T Lining Closeout
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 31.95

Don't let your big guys get cold or wet! This sheet is water proof and designed to keep your gentle giant happy and dry.
  • 420D nylon outer shell with 210T lining waterproof, breathable sheet
  • Fleece wither protector
  • Double buckle front closure for that extra strength
  • Leg straps, two inch wide belly strap and attached tail cover
  • Stainless steel hardware
  • **Discontinued design
  • Very hard to find 100" size!

entry.title: Derby 600D Nylon Waterproof Horse Rain Sheet with Lining - Light Weight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Turnout Sheets
Price: 51.99

Quality Rain Sheet with no back seam. Waterproof and breathable this sheet is great alone or under a blanket for extreme warmth. Guaranteed to provide light-weight protection and comfort. These sheets are about 1" bigger than size to take care of shrink after first wash.
  • 600D Ripstop, waterproof, breathable outer shell with no back seam
  • Adjustable low cross surcingles. Double front buckle closures
  • Tail cover
  • Removable, adjustable leg straps included
  • Smooth 210T nylon lining breathable, durable and moisture wicking

Trim color may vary from lot to lot

entry.title: Derby Originals West Coast Breathable 18oz Duck Canvas Sheet for Horses
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Stable Sheets
Price: 29.99

This heavy canvas sheet is great for keeping your horse clean at a show or as a liner under a winter blanket. This sheet is breathable and comfortable for your horse to wear.

This item has been discontinued and is on a closeout sale. There is very limited stock left in the sizes 72", 74", 78", and 82".

  • Front gusset for more freedom of movement
  • Includes a tail cover
  • Closes with 2 front buckles and a belly surcingle
  • This is a lightweight sheet ideal for using to keep your horse clean before a show or as a blanket warmer
  • This blanket has west coast style leg straps
